text: Shopgirls is a 1914 British silent drama film directed by Laurence Trimble and starring Florence Turner, Sidney Sinclair and Richard Steele.McFarlane & Slide p.771 ==Cast== * Florence Turner as Judith * Sidney Sinclair as Archer * Richard Steele as James Walker * Hector Dion as John Carter * Rhoda Grey as Grace ==References== ==Bibliography== * Brian McFarlane & Anthony Slide. The Encyclopedia of British Film: Fourth Edition. Oxford University Press, 2013. ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:1914 drama films Category:English-language films Category:British films Category:British silent feature films Category:British drama films Category:Films directed by Laurence Trimble Category:Films set in England Category:British black-and-white films Category:Hepworth Pictures films
title: Shopgirls
